articles_5.title: Sapphire, Tulip Compression to Deploy Clean Energy Tech in India's Gas Sector
articles_5.summary: Sapphire Technologies and Tulip Compression Private Limited have formed a partnership to implement FreeSpin In-line Turboexpander technology across India's natural gas infrastructure. The initiative aims to deploy over 150 FIT systems, potentially reducing CO2e emissions by 300,000 metric tons annually while improving energy efficiency across India's 24,000-kilometer pipeline network.
articles_5.content: Sapphire Technologies has partnered with Tulip Compression Private Limited (TCPL) to expand its clean energy technology in India's natural gas sector. The collaboration will bring Sapphire's FreeSpin In-line Turboexpander (FIT) technology to pressure regulation stations across the country, aiming to improve energy efficiency and reduce emissions...
